entry.title: fastai/lm-hackers
entry.summary:
Hackers' Guide to Language Models

A Hackers' Guide to Language Models

The notebook from the video is lm-hackers.ipynb. The other files are for axolotl fine-tuning.

entry.title: anthropics/anthropic-cookbook
entry.summary:
A collection of notebooks/recipes showcasing some fun and effective ways of using Claude.

Anthropic Cookbook

This cookbook contains recipes in the form of Jupyter notebooks for using Claude in neat and effective ways. You'll need an Anthropic API key, which you can apply for here.

Recipes

  • Long Context: Q&A
  • Long Context: Wikipedia Search
  • Long Context: PDF "Upload" and Summarization
